alert.note: Alert for Hunterdon (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:51AM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Hunterdon, northwestern Bucks and south central Northampton Counties through 630 AM EDT... At 550 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Springtown, or 10 miles south of Easton, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bethlehem, Byram, Bedminster, Hellertown, Tinicum, Dublin, Ferndale, Frenchtown, Milford, Riegelsville, Stockton, Pleasant Valley, Revere, Ottsville, Pipersville, Springtown, Erwinna, Gardenville, Lumberville and Sergeantsville. This includes Interstate 78 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 69 and 73. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
